MMP.JO.summary: Marshall Monteagle PLC, an investment holding company, engages in the import and distribution, and property holding businesses in South Africa, Europe, the United States, and the Middle East. The company owns and manages commercial property, and multi-tenanted rent properties; and imports, exports, distributes, and trades in hand tools, machinery, non-perishable food, coffee roasting, and other household consumer products, and metals and minerals. It also engages in the warehousing and logistics business; and provides trade finance solutions to a range of producers, traders, and end-users. Marshall Monteagle PLC is based in Saint Helier, the United Kingdom.
